name: jain-convocation-portal
description: A web portal for managing Jain University Convocation Images.

scripts.dev: pnpx concurrently -c "bgBlue.bold,bgGreen.bold,bgMagenta.bold" "pnpm run start:backend" "pnpm run start:frontend" "pnpm run start:queue"
scripts.init: pnpx concurrently -c "bgBlue.bold,bgGreen.bold,bgMagenta.bold" "cd backend && pnpm install" "cd frontend && pnpm install" "cd face-search-queue && pnpm install"

author: Jery
